pr_title: Allows for a BooleanParameter to be nullable/optional

timeline.message:
Allows for a BooleanParameter to be nullable/optional

There are cases where we need to know if the parameter is selected at all and not always default to false.
Default value is false unless markNullable is used.

Fixes: OX-5522

timeline.author: meg1502

timeline.bodyText:
this does not match the parsing of input.asBoolean which is used when the parameter is required, as $NLS.yes is also considerd as true (and $NLS.no as false)
->
if the parameter is required i will get true for "yes"
if the parameter is nullable i will get null for "yes"
timeline.author: meg1502

replies.author: meg1502

replies.bodyText: Cannot use input.asBoolean here (is actually the whole point of it), because it evaluates anything else as false. In this usage case (and the actual values of the selectBoolean template) only allow (and expect) true or false.
replies.author: idlira

replies.bodyText: but "yes" and "no" should still be parsed as booleans, and null should possibly only be returned if the value is not filled at all?
replies.author: meg1502

timeline.message:
Returns optional only when the value is not filled

This way it behaves the same as in the non-nullable case.
Strings such as yes, no will still be evaluated as boolean.
Foreign strings will be evaluated as false.
